title: Can't log in to my bank account
content: I can load their main page but I cannot log in. I get the error I have attached. Finally, I had to log in from Safari after a lot of hassle and help from a customer service rep. What happened? I have been logging in here for years from Firefox. I am not having this issue with any other site.
creator: lemoi50

title: Firefox Sync not working
content:
Hello,

I started using Firefox Sync between two MacOS system (with Firefox 107.0.1 64 bit) and iOS (Firefox 107.2 22549) but there is no way to have the syncronization to work. If i force a manual synchronization, there are some chances that the devices get in sync in a few minutes (I have to do this on each of them). If I don't do anything and just wait, they get hours before getting in sync. I don't have any strange network configuration and I tried reinstalling, logging in-out, switching on-off various sync options but nothing changed so far.

Any idea? Thank you.
creator: aleks0493

title: Emeegency, need new email account, any carrier
content:
12.5.22 Need help in geting new email account, any decent software gmail/proton, etc. zohomail in India'blocked my only email account. Must have one for my medical condition for heart failure. Live in rural area. Only phone is landline 505.466.2600. All new accounts procedures ask for mobile phone and/or text address..I do not have mobile phone...am age 90 and in hospice. 

Can someone assist me pleaseÂ ?

Blocked zohomail account accceptsincoming only for right now.
creator: ross1113

title: Parts of this page are not secure such as images
content:
Hi folks. The title of this question started 2 weeks ago. Was fine before, but now a yellow triangle on the padlock.

Running test sites show everything secure. I have certificates. No other browser shows a warning. I read your help article and all is just like it should be. .htaccess redirects domain.com to www.domain.com and http: to https: just as it should. But still this "error". It must be images in my header, footer and sidebar, but I cannot change the path for those in any way I can find.

How can I correct this?

Thanks!
creator: in4m8n
